subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New files,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I get those to, people asking for help, and one said saying mass helps(that
catholic connection again). I don't know what to do with that.

 F-S

On Sun, May 9, 2010 at 1:26 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
> Happy Mother's Day everyone, I just sent a sad file to my folder, there is
> a funny one in there too.  The sad one is an older lady and young man
> talking to each other, The lady is concerned, saying; "Nick, get up to the
> group, he responds with, "they'll see us, she says, are they praying for
> us?"  Pardon me, but I think we have been given this technology for a
> purpose, maybe it's to help these souls in darkness, i know some of you
> don't believe this, and it's always easier to turn our backs, and not see
> pain in someone else.  But, there is a reason, you with all those radios's
> out there, with all that power, try helping these folks over there, it won't
> hurt us to say silent prayers for them once and awhile think about it folks.
> sf
>
> 
>

I ge hose o, people asking o help, and one said saying mass helps( ha ca holic connec ion again). I don' know wha o do wi h ha . 
 
 F-S
